description:
Upon arriving at school, Hotaru learns from Natsumi that a class outing is planned for that day. Everyone sets out with high hopes, even though they haven`t been told where exactly they`re going. When they arrive, they find their teacher and Renge already decked out in work hats and rubber overalls...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Ran Away from Home with My Sister
Ich bin mit meiner Schwester von zu Hause weggelaufen
